[SIZE=4]Demolition-X is a new server that recently launched that welcomes all players , Our Goal is to make your runescape private server playing time enjoyable and profitable , We have active and friendly Staff that can help you 24/7. We have constant and unique updates that will afford your stay , We are advertising and trying our best to get players to make the server more enjoyable , Our server is vps hosted and ddos protected.[/SIZE]
[CENTER]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2wmkk93.png[/img][/CENTER]
[SIZE=4]★ Incredible Stability ★ Unique Features ★ Perfect Combat ★ 24/7/365 online ★ 100% Perfect Skilling ★ No dung and summon ★ Great and growing economy ★ Old School Pking ★ Fully working clan chat ★ Barrows minigame ★ Random PK Points With Shop Rewards ★ Highscores ★ vote for cash or prizes with vote point shop ★ All weapons working with specs ★ Custom whips ★ Custom teleport interface ★ Fun pk ★ All minigames ★ 25 skills And more ... [/SIZE]
[CENTER]---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2nk6gbq.png[/img][/CENTER]
